entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023
